targets.query:
from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_yield")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_operation_time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_self_consumption_kwh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_self_consumption_rate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_degree_of_self_sufficiency")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_total_home_consumption")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_generator_dc_input_1_power")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_generator_dc_input_1_power" or r["_field"] == "house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: ["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: r.pv_generator_dc_input_1_power - r.house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator", "pv_generator_dc_input_1_power"])

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "house_home_consumption_covered_by_grid")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_day_yield")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_day_total_home_consumption")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_day_self_consumption_kwh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_day_self_consumption_rate")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_day_degree_of_self_sufficiency")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pv")
  |> range(start: -1y, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pvwr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_yield")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "pv")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stats_total_self_consumption_kwh")
